title: CJ KIFT
text: CJ KIFT Co, Ltd. (<a href="hangul">hangul</a>:씨제이한국복합물류, "Shijei Hanguk Bokhap Mulryu") is a South Korean <a href="logistics">logistics</a> and <a href="shipping">shipping</a> company. headquartered in Bugok-dong <a href="Gunpo">Gunpo</a> <a href="Gyeonggi-do">Gyeonggi-do</a> and Taepyeong-Ro <a href="Jung-gu%2C%20Seuol">Jung-gu</a> <a href="Seoul">Seoul</a>, <a href="South%20Korea">South Korea</a>. established in 1998. it was a local, worldwide in <a href="logistics">llogistic</a>, <a href="freight">freight</a> and <a href="express%20mail">express</a> service products. Logistic center is based in <a href="Seoul">Seoul</a> and other Korea local. and group family by <a href="CJ%20Group">CJ Group</a>. The "CJ KIFT" CEO is Kim Jong Ho (김종호). The company is commonly referred to as "CJ KIFT" (Spelling your Cheil Jedang's Korea Integrated Freight Terminal).
